TopicTitle: The booster to end all boosters.

Articles.Content:
So I had the idea a few minutes ago to create a few very simple parts to solve the one of the biggest issues virtually every KSP player faces. How do you get BIG things to orbit? I mean, REALLY big. I mean things that take up most of the VAB themselves. Massive hollow cylinders. If there is interest I might make some massive tanks and boosters. To get big stuff to orbit, people usually just add more boosters, and more, and more condensing them all into much smaller numbers of parts should greatly reduce the strain on lower end processors as well. As long as they are proportionally scaled weight and cost wise it shouldn't really be any different than strapping them on the side... except less explodey.

Edited January 15, 2018 by SpaceMouse
Mock up for anyone wondering what I'm rambling about. ^
